commentBody:
This Celtics fan also thought the Pierce and Garnett trade was a bitter pill to swallow at the time. I really thought the Nets would be title contenders, but then Brooke Lopez went down and it didn't work out for them. And when he traded Rondo, I'm not sure Danny even knew how good Jae Crowder would be.
He has been a great GM, but sometimes you also have to get lucky.
